title: Ep 174: Talking Too Faced with co-founder Jerrod Blandino
itunes:title: Ep 174: Talking Too Faced with co-founder Jerrod Blandino
itunes:subtitle: Too Faced co-founder Jerrod Blandino is here to chat about his journey from the Estée Lauder counter to building a brand that was acquired by the beauty giant. He also opens up about money, spirituality, mascara, and more. Before that, we talk...
description:
Too Faced co-founder Jerrod Blandino is here to chat about his journey from the Estée Lauder counter to building a brand that was acquired by the beauty giant. He also opens up about money, spirituality, mascara, and more. Before that, we talk labiaplasty (!), Birkenstock’s new skincare line, and the newest take on pastel hair. 


Want more Fat Mascara?
